result.title: Is making a blog advisable?
result.content: I have noticed that there are a lot of problems whose editorials are unwritten on codechef, some editorials of medium hard problems are not understandable for beginners, many useful blog posts on codeforces are unorganized and scattered throughout. So, will it be a good idea if I start a personal wordpress blog? Also, this seems to be a good way to improve myself and have a good measure of how I improve. Thank you in advance :)
